segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on one foot, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on the cookies that they don’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting backward, and I can’t watch this anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, he’s going to fall right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he grabs the jar and gets down safely before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
